actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of a gold medal to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the Girl Scouts of the United States of America.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of Congress, to present a gold medal to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the Girl Scouts of the United States of America. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the sale of bronze duplicates of the medal.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of a gold medal to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the Girl Scouts of the United States of America.
